Select count(mem_no) as counts From member Where mem_exdate is null And mem_mngr is null

Select count(mem_date) as counts , a.ymd as ymd From member right join ( Select to_date('20181206', 'yyyyMMdd')+(level-1) as ymd From dual Connect by level < = sysdate - (to_date('20181206', 'yyyyMMdd'))+1) a On (to_char(mem_date, 'YYYY/MM/dd') = a.ymd) Where mem_mngr is null Group by a.ymd Order by a.ymd

Select count(mem_exdate) as counts, a.ymd as ymd From member right join ( select to_date('20181206', 'yyyyMMdd')+(level-1) as ymd from dual connect by level < = sysdate - (to_date('20181206', 'yyyyMMdd'))+1) a On (to_char(mem_date, 'YYYY/MM/dd') = a.ymd) Where mem_mngr is null Group by a.ymd Order by a.ymd

Select count(mem_date) as counts , to_char(a.ymd,'YYYY/MM') as ymd From member right join ( Select add_months(to_date('201811', 'yyyyMM'),(level-1)) as ymd From dual Connect by level < = months_between( add_months(sysdate,1) , to_date('201811', 'yyyyMM'))) a On (to_char(mem_date, 'YYYY/MM') = to_char(a.ymd,'YYYY/MM')) Where mem_mngr is null Group by to_char(a.ymd,'YYYY/MM') Order by to_char(a.ymd,'YYYY/MM')

Select count(mem_exdate) as counts , to_char(a.ymd,'YYYY/MM') as ymd From member right join ( Select add_months(to_date('201811', 'yyyyMM'),(level-1)) as ymd From dual Connect by level < = months_between( add_months(sysdate,1) , to_date('201811', 'yyyyMM'))) a On (to_char(mem_exdate, 'YYYY/MM') = to_char(a.ymd,'YYYY/MM')) Where mem_mngr is null Group by to_char(a.ymd,'YYYY/MM') Order by to_char(a.ymd,'YYYY/MM')
Select count(mem_no) as counts , mem_gndr, mem_age From member Where mem_gndr is not null And mem_age is not null Group by mem_gndr, mem_age Order by mem_gndr, mem_age

Select favor_gu, favor_dong, favor_zip, favor_rd, counts, bc_nm, Row_number() Over ( Order by counts desc) as rank From (Select count(*) as counts, favor_gu, favor_dong, favor_zip, favor_rd From favorite Group by favor_gu, favor_dong, favor_zip, favor_rd) Inner Join article on (favor_gu = artcl_gu and favor_dong = artcl_dong and favor_zip = artcl_zip and favor_rd = artcl_rd) Inner Join building_classf on ( artcl_bc = bc_no) Where Rownum < = 30

Select favor_gu, favor_dong, counts, Row_number() Over ( Order by counts desc) as rank From (Select count(*) as counts, favor_gu, favor_dong From favorite Group by favor_gu, favor_dong) Where Rownum < = 20
Select favor_gu, counts, Row_number() Over ( Order by counts desc) as rank From (Select count(*) as counts, favor_gu From favorite Group by favor_gu)
